languages.text: {n}Новый взрыв внутри Дикаря сотрясает его железное тело, в глазах двоится от вибрации.{/n} "Вот теперь вы чувствуете его настоящую силу. Он способен промчать всю магистраль за минуту, дай ему волю... И убить всех, кто на нем поедет, на такой-то скорости. Теперь главное — подаем тягу на главный ротор. Беритесь за парные рычаги и тяните с силой".

{n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."
languages.original_text: {n}Новый взрыв внутри Дикаря сотрясает его железное тело, в глазах двоится от вибрации.{/n} "Вот теперь вы чувствуете его настоящую силу. Он способен промчать всю магистраль за минуту, дай ему волю... И убить всех, кто на нем поедет, на такой-то скорости. Теперь главное — подаем тягу на главный ротор. Беритесь за парные рычаги и тяните с силой".

He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now apply thrust to the main rotor. Grab the paired levers and pull them firmly."

languages.text: {n}Una nueva explosión en el interior de Salvaje sacude su cuerpo de hierro, provocando tal vibración que te hace ver doble.{/n} «Ahora siente su auténtico poder. Puede recorrer toda la línea de carga en un minuto, si le deja... y matar a todo el que lleve a bordo con esa velocidad. Ahora prueba a darle un poco de impulso al rotor principal: coja esas palancas gemelas y tire con firmeza».
languages.original_text: {n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una nueva explosión en el interior de Salvaje sacude su cuerpo de hierro, provocando tal vibración que te hace ver doble.{/n} «Ahora siente su auténtico poder. Puede recorrer toda la línea de carga en un minuto, si le deja... y matar a todo el que lleve a bordo con esa velocidad. Ahora prueba a darle un poco de impulso al rotor principal: coja esas palancas gemelas y tire con firmeza».

languages.text: {n}サベージの中の新たな爆発が、鉄の身体を揺さぶった。揺れですべてが二重に見える。{/n} 「今、あなたは彼の本当の力を感じている。彼はたったの1分で貨物線全体を走り切ることができるでしょう…そして、そのスピードで乗っている者を、皆殺しにする。さあ、メインローターに推力をかけてください。ペア―になったレバーをつかんで、力を込めて引っ張ってください」
languages.original_text: {n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."

traits.locale_text: {n}サベージの中の新たな爆発が、鉄の身体を揺さぶった。揺れですべてが二重に見える。{/n} 「今、あなたは彼の本当の力を感じている。彼はたったの1分で貨物線全体を走り切ることができるでしょう…そして、そのスピードで乗っている者を、皆殺しにする。さあ、メインローターに推力をかけてください。ペア―になったレバーをつかんで、力を込めて引っ張ってください」

languages.text: {n}萨维奇内部发生了猛烈的爆炸，钢铁铸就的躯体不断震动，震得你眼前的一切都出现了重影。{/n}“现在，您已经感受到了它真正的力量。如果给它机会的话，它可以在一分钟之内跑完整条货运线路，顺便颠死它身上的所有人。好了，试着为主转动引擎施加推力吧，抓住成对的拉杆，用力拉一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."

traits.locale_text: {n}萨维奇内部发生了猛烈的爆炸，钢铁铸就的躯体不断震动，震得你眼前的一切都出现了重影。{/n}“现在，您已经感受到了它真正的力量。如果给它机会的话，它可以在一分钟之内跑完整条货运线路，顺便颠死它身上的所有人。好了，试着为主转动引擎施加推力吧，抓住成对的拉杆，用力拉一下。”

languages.text: {n}Eine neue Explosion in Wilds Innerem erschüttert seinen Eisenkörper, und die Vibration sorgt dafür, dass du doppelt siehst.{/n} "Jetzt spürt Ihr seine wahre Kraft. Er schafft die gesamte Frachtroute in einer Minute, wenn man ihn lässt ... Und tötet jeden, der bei dieser Geschwindigkeit mitfährt. Versucht jetzt, etwas Schub auf den Hauptrotor zu legen – nehmt dieses Hebelpaar und zieht kräftig daran."
languages.original_text: {n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine neue Explosion in Wilds Innerem erschüttert seinen Eisenkörper, und die Vibration sorgt dafür, dass du doppelt siehst.{/n} "Jetzt spürt Ihr seine wahre Kraft. Er schafft die gesamte Frachtroute in einer Minute, wenn man ihn lässt ... Und tötet jeden, der bei dieser Geschwindigkeit mitfährt. Versucht jetzt, etwas Schub auf den Hauptrotor zu legen – nehmt dieses Hebelpaar und zieht kräftig daran."

languages.text: {n}Une nouvelle explosion fait trembler le corps d'acier de Sauvage, et vous voyez double sous l'effet des vibrations.{/n} « Vous sentez toute la puissance qui l'habite ? Si on lui en donne l'occasion, il peut parcourir la ligne de fret d'un bout à l'autre en moins d'une minute... et tuer tous ceux qui ont l'audace de s'élancer sur les rails à pareille vitesse. À présent, essayez d'actionner la poussée du rotor principal. Saisissez-vous de ces leviers jumeaux et tirez un bon coup. »
languages.original_text: {n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."

Si on lui en donne l'occasion, il peut parcourir la ligne de fret d'un bout à l'autre en moins d'une minute... et tuer tous ceux qui ont l'audace de s'élancer sur les rails à pareille vitesse. À présent, essayez d'actionner la poussée du rotor principal. Saisissez-vous de ces leviers jumeaux et tirez un bon coup. »

languages.text: {n}Hoyrat'ın demirden bedeni, içindeki yeni bir patlamayla sarsılıyor. Yayılan titreşim, gözlerinin çift görmesine yol açıyor.{/n} "İşte şimdi onun gerçek gücünü hissediyorsunuz. İmkân bulsa tüm o yük hattını bir dakikada geçer ve... O hızda onu süreni öldürür. Şimdi ana rotora biraz baskı uygulamaya çalışın. Şu ikili kolu kavrayıp sıkıca çekin."
languages.original_text: {n}A new explosion inside Savage shakes his iron body, causing your eyes to see double from the vibration.{/n} "Now you are feeling his real power. He can run down the entire freight line in a minute, given the chance... And kill everyone who rides him at that speed. Now, try applying some thrust to the main rotor — grab those paired levers and give them a firm tug."
